document.full_text: danish luxury electronics maker bang & olufsen is confident it can turn around its lackluster core audio-video business and will not rule out divestments, its new chief executive said.
document.title: bang & olufsen pledges core unit turnaround
lines_and_colors: danish luxury electronics maker bang & olufsen is confident it can turn around its lackluster core audio-video business and will not rule out divestments, its new chief executive said.
